governor.title: Hon’ble Governor – A Visionary Force in Education
governor.name: Smt. Anandiben Patel
governor.message:
FS University takes immense pride in its association with Smt. Anandiben Patel, Hon’ble Governor of Uttar Pradesh, whose lifelong dedication to education and social development has set a benchmark for institutions across the nation. Her steadfast vision for an inclusive, progressive, and future-ready education system resonates deeply with FS University’s mission of providing transformative learning opportunities to students from every background.

Throughout her distinguished career, Smt. Anandiben Patel has championed women’s empowerment, advanced skill development, and upheld academic excellence. Her leadership has invigorated higher education, inspiring innovation, research, and holistic student growth.

At FS University, we draw strength from her example—embedding her values of integrity, knowledge, and leadership into every aspect of our academic environment. Guided by her vision, we remain committed to nurturing graduates who are not only skilled professionals but also responsible citizens and leaders of tomorrow.

chancellor.title: Chancellor’s Message
chancellor.name: Dr. Dileep Yadav
chancellor.message:
विद्या ददाति विनयं विनयाद्याति पात्रताम् । पात्रत्वाद्धनमाप्नोति धनाद्धर्मं ततः सुखम् ॥

Knowledge imparts humility, humility bestows worthiness, worthiness brings prosperity, prosperity nurtures virtue, and virtue leads to true happiness.

At FS University, this timeless wisdom guides our journey. It has been our privilege and responsibility to fulfill the educational aspirations of society with unwavering commitment. In pursuit of this mission, we have established world-class infrastructure, fostered a dynamic teaching–learning ecosystem, and built a robust support framework to ensure the growth and progression of every student.

We firmly believe that education is not limited to classrooms. True learning extends into every sphere of student life. With this vision, FS University offers abundant opportunities for co-curricular, extracurricular, and sporting activities, ensuring a balanced and holistic development. Our thoughtfully designed hostel facilities provide a safe, nurturing, and homely environment that allows students to thrive with confidence.

Over the years, FS University has earned recognition for producing competent, confident, and globally minded professionals who embody both innovation and ethics. Our graduates are not only equipped with knowledge and skills but also imbued with Sanskar—values that inspire service, leadership, and contribution to nation-building.

As Chancellor, I assure every student that FS University is more than an institution—it is a transformative experience. Here, every learner is prepared to craft their own success story, empowered to expand the boundaries of knowledge and to lead with wisdom and integrity.

pro-chancellor.title: Pro Chancellor’s Message
pro-chancellor.name: Dr. Yogesh Yadav
pro-chancellor.message:
FS University is more than an institution of higher learning—it is a movement dedicated to transforming lives through education. Every member of our community—students, faculty, alumni, and partners—is an integral part of this mission.

The foundation of FS University is deeply rooted in the vision of our revered grandfather, Late Shri Fulan Singh Ji, whose ideals continue to guide and inspire us. His dream of creating an institution that empowers individuals through knowledge and values lives on in every endeavor we pursue. Today, FS University stands recognized for its industry-focused, practical approach to education, attracting bright minds and nurturing them into capable professionals. The success of our alumni across top global organizations bears testimony to the dedication of our distinguished faculty and the strength of our academic model.

We are committed to offering our students a dynamic environment for holistic development—one that emphasizes not only intellectual growth but also moral, ethical, and social responsibility. Our global engagement initiatives, including student-exchange programs, international internships, and cross-border collaborations, ensure that FS University students gain the exposure, networks, and progressive outlook required to excel in today’s interconnected world.

Our lush green campus, equipped with world-class infrastructure and cutting-edge technology, provides a vibrant platform for both in-person and digital learning. Alongside academics, our curriculum is enriched with co-curricular and extracurricular opportunities that foster physical, intellectual, and emotional well-being.

At FS University, we are not just preparing students for careers—we are shaping future leaders who embody values, vision, and a deep commitment to humanity. These young changemakers will be the ones to inspire, innovate, and lead the world forward.

trustee.title: Trustee’s Message
trustee.name: Dr. Rahul Yadav
trustee.message:
FS University has come to symbolize excellence, progress, and success in higher education. Guided by the philosophy of “modernity blending with tradition while fostering talent,” we are committed to nurturing well-rounded individuals who are prepared to meet the demands of a rapidly changing world.

Our approach extends far beyond classroom learning. By integrating academics with extracurricular engagement, we create an ecosystem that promotes creativity, innovation, and holistic growth. Cutting-edge technologies, groundbreaking ideas, and the latest research practices are continuously incorporated into our teaching and scholarly activities—benefiting students, researchers, faculty, and academicians across the globe.

To keep our intellectual community at the forefront, FS University organizes a wide range of academic enrichment programs, including guest lectures, seminars, conferences, faculty development programs, hands-on training, and workshops. These initiatives not only strengthen our knowledge base but also foster a culture of continuous learning and innovation.

I am proud to share that FS University has invested in dedicated infrastructure and world-class resources to provide an unparalleled teaching–learning experience. With these efforts, we aim to empower our students with knowledge, skills, and values that enable them to become global contributors and leaders.

At FS University, education is not just a process—it is a lifelong journey. We remain committed to imparting high-quality learning experiences and shaping a pool of world-class talent equipped to serve society with wisdom and integrity.

trustees.title: Trustee’s Message
trustees.name: Dr. Nitin Yadav
trustees.message:
At FS University, we hold an unwavering belief in the transformative power of education. Our mission is to create an environment that nurtures young minds, equipping them with the knowledge, skills, and values essential to thrive in an ever-evolving world. We aspire to empower our students to grow into critical thinkers, compassionate individuals, and responsible global citizens.

Education, in our vision, extends far beyond the transfer of information—it is about inspiring curiosity, fostering creativity, and instilling a lifelong love for learning. To realize this vision, FS University remains dedicated to delivering the highest quality education. We take pride in recruiting and retaining exceptional faculty members whose passion for teaching and depth of expertise shape a truly enriching academic experience. By providing them with the resources and support they need, we ensure that every student benefits from a well-rounded and future-ready education.

As trustees, we are deeply committed to upholding the values that define FS University—excellence, integrity, and innovation. Together, we look forward to a future filled with limitless possibilities, where our graduates continue to inspire change and lead with purpose across the world.

secretary.title: Secretary’s Message
secretary.name: Dr. Dinesh Chandra
secretary.message:
At FS University, we believe that education is a shared responsibility—an endeavor where management, faculty, parents, and students work together to shape a brighter tomorrow. True education is not limited to preparing for prestigious careers; it is a lifelong journey that instills moral and ethical values, guiding students to become responsible, compassionate, and upright citizens of our nation.

We are committed to fostering an environment where academic excellence is seamlessly integrated with sports, co-curricular, and extracurricular activities. Our focus is on cultivating intellectual curiosity, encouraging critical thinking, and nurturing a spirit of innovation and excellence.

Through this holistic approach, FS University prepares students not only for professional success but also for meaningful contributions to society. Together, we aspire to build a community of learners who carry forward the values of knowledge, integrity, and service.

vice-chancellor.title: Vice Chancellor’s Message
vice-chancellor.name: Prof. (Dr.) Sanjeev Bhardwaj
vice-chancellor.message:
When an institution is founded on the ethos of excellence in research and innovation, with a commitment to creating positive social impact, it inevitably makes its mark on the educational landscape. FS University stands today as one of India’s most prestigious universities—emerging as a global leader in education.

We are proud to be counted among the premier institutions that uphold the highest standards of pedagogy, research, and student-centric learning. At FS University, our mission is not only to shape India’s intellectual capital but also to contribute to the world by nurturing young minds into tomorrow’s global leaders across diverse fields of human endeavor.

From its inception, FS University has been driven by a single-minded goal: to raise academic and research standards while fostering holistic growth. Our vision is to transform the brightest young talents into responsible global citizens, equipped with the knowledge, creativity, and values to challenge and change the world.

FSU is a confluence of global and local knowledge, scientific inquiry and creative thought, futuristic research and innovative practice. Here, learning is continuous and dynamic—extending seamlessly beyond classrooms into industry and society. I am confident that our distinguished faculty, dynamic students, and dedicated fraternity will play a pivotal role in realizing the vision of making FS University a world-class, research-driven institution.

At FS University, we believe in focusing on every student—helping them realize their fullest potential while instilling in them a spirit of excellence and a winning attitude. Together, we are building not just professionals, but leaders who will shape a better tomorrow.

director-general.title: Director General’s Message
director-general.name: Dr. Abhinav Srivastava
director-general.message:
In a world that is constantly evolving, it is the courage to think beyond boundaries and challenge the status quo that sets FS University apart as a true pioneer in education. Our deep understanding of emerging trends and technologies enables us to adapt, innovate, and thrive in a rapidly changing global landscape.

At FS University, we are committed to fostering an environment where academic excellence, innovation, and personal development go hand in hand. With a wide range of programs across diverse disciplines, we empower students to explore their passions, build specialized expertise, and acquire the knowledge and skills needed to succeed in today’s dynamic world.

Through strategic partnerships with leading institutions worldwide, FS University provides students with study-abroad opportunities, international internships, and cross-cultural experiences. These initiatives nurture global citizenship, broaden perspectives, and prepare our graduates to excel in a globalized society.

Our highly qualified faculty and dedicated staff are the pillars of this journey—mentors who guide, support, and inspire students to achieve their full potential. Beyond academics, our vibrant campus offers rich cultural, social, and extracurricular experiences, ensuring holistic growth and lifelong memories.

As Director General, I assure you that every initiative at FS University is designed with your success in mind. This is more than an educational journey—it is a transformative experience. I encourage you to be curious, ask bold questions, embrace challenges, and step confidently beyond your comfort zone.

Your success is our mission, and at FS University, we are here to support you every step of the way.
